title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2831/98 of 22 December 1998 amending Regulation (EC) No 1503/96 on the detailed rules for the application of Council Regulation (EC) No 3072/95 with regard to import duties on rice
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2831/98 of 22 December 1998 amending Regulation (EC) No 1503/96 on the detailed rules for the application of Council Regulation (EC) No 3072/95 with regard to import duties on rice
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Annex I to Regulation (EC) No 1503/96 is replaced by the Annex to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 22 December 1998.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 329, 30. 12. 1995, p. 18.
(2) OJ L 265, 30. 9. 1998, p. 4.
(3) OJ L 104, 22. 4. 1997, p. 12.
(4) OJ L 194, 10. 7. 1998, p. 5.
(5) OJ L 189, 30. 7. 1996, p. 71.
(6) OJ L 194, 23. 7. 1997, p. 2.
